title: F.I.L.A. (Fallin' In Love Again)
description: "F.I.L.A. (Fallin' In Love Again)" is a heartfelt and melodic fusion of modern Punjabi-pop, emotional storytelling, and smooth urban production. Hunny Usnk explores the highs, lows, and unforgettable moments of love through four deeply expressive tracks, each carrying its own vibe and emotional weight.
theme: "F.I.L.A." is not just an EP—it's a journey through love, heartbreak, healing, and rediscovery. Hunny Usnk delivers raw emotion, relatable lyrics, and a fresh Punjabi-pop sound that stays with you long after the music stops.

tracks.title: Akhiyan
tracks.description: A soft, romantic vibe where emotions speak louder than words. Akhiyan captures the feeling of longing—eyes that tell stories of love, separation, and hope.

tracks.title: Gossips (Tere Karke)
tracks.description: A bold, punchy track featuring Ayush Munjal. This song tackles rumours, misunderstandings, and the pressure of relationships in a world full of noise.

tracks.title: Dooriyan
tracks.description: An emotional deep-cut. Dooriyan expresses the pain of distance—physical, emotional, and unspoken. A song for those who fell apart but still feel connected.

tracks.title: Mine (Mere Sajna)
tracks.description: A dreamy, warm confession of love. This track blends romantic lyrics with a modern, smooth production, making it the perfect finale to the EP.
